eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.rt

Class AdvanceBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.rt.AdvanceBlock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetItem, Merge, Reverse

    public abstract class AdvanceBlock
extends Object
    The generic ADVANCE block.
    Author:
    karnokd, 2011.06.22.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(AdvanceBlockDescription desc,
        Map<String,AdvanceConstantBlock> constantParams)
        Initialize the block with the given definition and body function.
        Parameters:
        desc - the description of the block
        constantParams - the map of those parameters who have a constant input instead of other output ports

      • getReactivePorts

        public List<AdvancePort> getReactivePorts()
        Returns:
        Retrieves a list of ports which are of reactive nature, e.g., they are not constants.

      • getConstantPorts

        public List<AdvancePort> getConstantPorts()
        Returns:
        Retrieves a list of ports which are of reactive nature, e.g., they are not constants.

      • run

        public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer<Void> run(hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler scheduler)
        Schedule the execution of the body function.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - the scheduler based on the block's preference
        Returns:
        the observer to trigger in the run phase

      • runReactiveBlock

        protected hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer<Void> runReactiveBlock(hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler scheduler,
                                                                 List<AdvancePort> reactivePorts)

        By default bind the reactive ports of the block with a combiner function which will execute the body function if all of the inputs are available.

        Override this method if you want different input-parameter reaction.

        Parameters:
        scheduler - the scheduler to be used by the body function
        reactivePorts - the list of the reactive ports to use.
        Returns:
        the observer to trigger the execution in the run phase but it is empty

      • runConstantBlock

        protected hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observer<Void> runConstantBlock(hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Scheduler scheduler)
        Wraps the body function into a callback-style invocation scheme for constant or no-input blocks to execute them immediately when the flow begins to execute.
        Parameters:
        scheduler - the scheduler to use for the invocation
        Returns:
        the observer to trigger the execution

      • dispatchOutput

        protected void dispatchOutput(Map<String,XElement> funcOut)
        Dispatches the given map of output values to various ports.
        Parameters:
        funcOut - the function output

      • invoke

        protected abstract void invoke(Map<String,XElement> params)
        The body function to invoke. Implementation should should invoke the dispatchOutput(Map) method when the computation is over. This may happen synchronously (or asynchronously)
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters

      • done

        public void done()
        Terminate the block.

      • getGid

        public int getGid()
        Returns:
        the block global id.

      • getDescription

        public AdvanceBlockDescription getDescription()
        Returns:
        the block's description.

      • getDiagnosticPort

        public hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.Observable<AdvanceBlockDiagnostic> getDiagnosticPort()
        Returns:
        the diagnostic port for watch the invocation of the body function

      • getOutput

        public AdvanceBlockPort getOutput(@NonNull
                         String name)
        Get the given output port by name.
        Parameters:
        name - the port name
        Returns:
        the block port

      • saveState

        public XElement saveState()
        Called after the block has been detached and done() has been called in case the engine is shut down (but not when the realm is stopped).
        Returns:
        if a non-null value is returned, it indicates the state to be saved

      • restoreState

        public void restoreState(XElement state)
        Called before the observer of the run() method is signalled in case the engine is restarted after a shutdown (but not when the realm was manually stopped) and the saveState() returned an object.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to restore
